subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Cubs, like the Dodgers, have watched their top two starters fall short against the Mets in the postseason, while the Mets have shown how deep their own rotation is.
snippet: The Cubs, like the Dodgers, have watched their top two starters fall short against the Mets in the postseason, while the Mets have shown how deep their own rotation is.
